mapper.sql: /*[TbMetaCmpnyObjD.xml][select][TANINE]*/ SELECT CMPNY_CD , SYS_CD , OBJ_GBCD , NMG_MAX_WDH , PRFX_CD , US_YN , CRT_DTM , CRT_ID , MDF_DTM , MDF_ID FROM TB_META_CMPNY_OBJ_D WHERE CMPNY_CD = #{cmpny_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND OBJ_GBCD = #{obj_gbcd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SYS_CD = #{sys_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
